about_the_game:
About this Game


Embark on an epic adventure in this top-down action RPG! Take on the role of Ned, a disgruntled demon employee seeking to restore Hell's former glory. Confront your resistant manager, battle the 7 Sins and Satan, and make Hell great again in this thrilling demon-filled quest!

Is This Game For You?


Fire & Brim Co. is for anyone who loves the classic top-down shooter experiences but enjoys a rich story with epic boss fights. The game features a unique ability system that creates endless possibilities and replayability.

Game Features

  • Epic Story Line
  • Learn as you play
  • Hidden Easter Eggs
  • Ongoing Development
